event.title: July 1, 2013, the city's population was estimated

data.event: As of July 1, 2013, the city's population was estimated to be 133,358 (U.S. Census Bureau, July 2014 release).

event.title: 1860, the city was the location of the South Carolina Secession Convention, which marked

data.event: In 1860, the city was the location of the South Carolina Secession Convention, which marked the departure of the first state from the Union in the events leading up to the Civil War.
